title: R & RStudio
text:
Reproducible Research


‚ÄúResearch is reproducible when others can reproduce the results of a scientific study given only the original data, code, and documentation.‚Äù



Source: [@alstonBeginnersGuideConducting2021]

title: R & RStudio
text:
Reproducible Research Requires:

Data - access to original data.
Code - others can read, learn & replicate results.
Documentation - complete information about how to conduct the study.

title: GITHUB
text: üò¢

title: GITHUB
text:
Version Control


Version control is a system that records changes to a file or set of files over time so that you can recall specific versions later. (Atlassian 2025)



Version control is like a time machine for your files. It keeps track of all the changes made to your documents, code, or any other files over time. (Le Chat)

title: GITHUB
text:
üòç Why use Version Control?

Avoid Losing Work:

Ever accidentally deleted something important? With version control, you can easily recover previous versions of your files.

Collaborate Easily:

Working with a team? Version control allows multiple people to work on the same project without overwriting each other‚Äôs changes.

Track Changes:

Know exactly who made what changes and when. This is especially useful for keeping track of progress and identifying issues.

Experiment Safely:

Want to try something new without risking your current work? Version control lets you create branches to experiment with new ideas. If it doesn‚Äôt work out, you can always go back to the original version.

title: GITHUB

GitHub Sign up





Username advice

all small cases
use hyphen - to separate the words
the shorter the better
make it timeless (do not ajay-jnu, ajay-ny, ajay-microsoft)
avoid special characters
reuse from your social media
comfortable to reveal to the world

title: GITHUB
text:
Save GitHub Username in RStudio

Using Console, Install R package usethis


## install if needed (do this exactly once):
## install.packages("usethis")

library(usethis)
use_git_config(user.name = "ajay-kolii",
               user.email = "mynameajay@gmail.com")


To See Saved Credentials, Run in Terminal git config --global --list



Read more here: https://usethis.r-lib.org/articles/git-credentials.html

title: GITHUB
text:
GitHub‚Äôs Personal Access Token (PAT)


It is a way to authenticate and interact with GitHub‚Äôs API and repositories without using your username and password.

title: GITHUB
text:
Create GitHub‚Äôs PAT in Console

library(gitcreds)
create_github_token()

title: Publish using Quarto
section: Welcome to SARA Data Science Bootcamp!
text:
Welcome to SARA Data Science Bootcamp!
Quarto is a wonderful tool for publishing websites, theses, books, articles, and much more. We want your publications to be as beautiful and elegant as lotus flowers.
This is the website for the slides of the SARA Data Science Bootcamp - ‚ÄúPublish using Quarto.‚Äù At SARA, we strongly believe in accessible data science education.
If you found our study materials useful, please give us a star on GitHub.
Star


Thank you for your support!
Email us at sara.institute.info@gmail.com \(\cdot\) Call us at 925 315 2024.

title: WEBSITE
text:
Understanding the Project Structure
website-ajay/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ _quarto.yml
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ index.qmd
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ about.qmd
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ styles.css


_quarto.yml: Configuration file for your website.
index.qmd: The homepage of your website.
about.qmd: An example about page.
styles.css: Custom CSS for styling your website.

title: WEBSITE
text: Create the Homepage

title: WEBSITE
text:
Edit index.qmd
---
title: "Dr. Ajay Kumar Koli"
subtitle: "Data Science Educator <br>Co-founder of SARA"
image: images/ajay.jpeg
about:
  template: trestles
  links:
    - icon: github
      text: GitHub
      href: https://github.com/sara-institute
    - icon: linkedin
      text: LinkedIn
      href: https://www.linkedin.com/in/ajay-kumar-koli/
    - icon: twitter
      text: Twitter
      href: https://www.linkedin.com/in/ajay-kumar-koli/
---

Content goes here.

title: WEBSITE
text: Website Navigation

title: WEBSITE
text:
Edit _quarto.yml
project: 
  type: website

website:
  title: "Dr. Ajay Kumar Koli"
  navbar:
    left:
      - text: "Home"
        href: index.qmd
      - text: "About"
        href: about.qmd
    tools:
      - icon: github
        href: https://github.com/koliajaykr
      - icon: linkedin
        href: https://www.linkedin.com/in/ajay-kumar-koli/
      - icon: twitter
        href: https://x.com/ajay_kolii
